data.title: Ajinomoto Monosodium Glutamate (MSG) 200g
data.meta_description: Discover the unique flavor-enhancing properties of Ajinomoto Monosodium Glutamate (MSG) 200g. Perfect for elevating your culinary creations, this high-quality MSG is a must-have for any kitchen. Shop now at Asia Market Ireland.
data.text:
Please note for now we only deliver frozen products to county Dublin

Do you still want to add the product to your cart?

Elevate your culinary creations with Ajinomoto Monosodium Glutamate (MSG) 200g, the key to unlocking the elusive fifth taste, Umami. This finely ground seasoning powder is a staple in kitchens worldwide, renowned for its ability to enhance the natural flavors of a wide array of dishes.

Crafted from a blend of natural ingredients like corn, sugar cane, and tapioca, Ajinomoto MSG is produced through a distinctive fermentation process that ensures purity and quality. Just a pinch of this potent powder can transform your home-cooked meals into gourmet experiences, bringing out a depth of flavor that tantalizes the taste buds.

Whether you’re sprinkling it over savory soups, mixing it into marinades, or using it as a secret ingredient in your signature sauces, Ajinomoto’s MSG is the ultimate umami booster. This 200g pack is perfectly sized for both the occasional home cook and the seasoned chef, promising to make every meal memorable with its rich, savory essence. Discover the taste of umami with Ajinomoto — where a little goes a long way.
